code: import{HttpClient}from'./lib/httpClient';var TYPE=process.env.NODE_ENV;var BASE_URL_LIVE=process.env.REACT_APP_BASE_URL;var BASE_URL_DEV=process.env.REACT_APP_BASE_URL_DEV;var BASE_PRODUCT_VERSION=process.env.REACT_APP_VERSION;var BASE_URL=TYPE==="development"?BASE_URL_DEV:BASE_URL_LIVE;var getAllPage=function getAllPage(token){return HttpClient.post("".concat(BASE_URL,"/api/v1/setting/device/remove_api"),params);};var getDepartment=function getDepartment(params){return AppAPI={BASE_URL:BASE_URL,BASE_PRODUCT_VERSION:BASE_PRODUCT_VERSION,getAllTimeKeeping:getAllTimeKeeping,getAllColumn:getAllColumn,getAllDevice:getAllDevice,addDevice:addDevice,addApiReciverData:addApiReciverData,removeDevice:removeDevice,removeItemAPI:removeItemAPI,getDepartment:getDepartment,createCustomer:createCustomer,getListCustomer:getListCustomer,getPrefixName:getPrefixName,getDetailtCustomer:getDetailtCustomer};export{AppAPI};
